name: Conjure Device
description: Conjures a nonmagical device.

name: Lesser Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv2 or below mage spell.

name: Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv7 or below mage spell.

name: Greater Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv13 or below mage spell.

name: Master Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv17 or below mage spell.

name: Lesser Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure made of either wood or iron that is up to 25sqft and 1 floor.

name: Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure made of wood, iron, and stone. The structure may have basic electrical components, 500sqrt, and be up to 3 stories tall.

name: Greater Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure that is made from any non-magical material, has electricity, 10000sqft, and up to 10 stories tall.

name: Master Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure that is made from any non-magical material, has electricity, 25000sqft, and up to 50 stories tall.

name: Lesser Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure a simple vehicle made of wood and iron, no bugger than an Oregon trail wagon.

name: Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure an electric, non-programmable, vehicle made from any non-magical material.

name: Greater Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure a high-tech vehicle.

name: Lesser Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 3.

name: Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 7.

name: Greater Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 11.

name: Master Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 15.

name: Lesser Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create lesser devices.

name: Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create devices.

name: Greater Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create greater devices.

name: Create Device
description: Create a non-magical device. Requires gp.

name: Mathematics
description: Solve a complex mathematical problem or recieve a hint of how to solve the problem if it is a puzzle.

name: Construction
description: Create non-magical buildings. Requires gp.

name: Intuit Device
description: Learn how a device works and how to rebuild it.

name: Create Lesser Magical Device
description: Create a device that is either magically powered or has the capabilities of a level 2 mage spell.

name: Create Magical Device
description: Create a device that is either magically powered or has the capabilities of a level 7 mage spell.

name: Create Greater Magical Device
description: Create a device that is either magically powered or has the capabilities of a level 13 mage spell.

name: Create Master Magical Device
description: Create a device that is either magically powered or has the capabilities of a level 17 mage spell.

name: Gather Elements
description: Collect 1d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Advanced Gather Elements
description: Collect 2d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Expert Gather Elements
description: Collect 3d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Chink In Armor
description: Determine the weaknesses of a creature or device.

name: Lucky Break
description: Reroll a creafting roll. May be done once per craft per level of this skill.

name: Create Vehicle
description: Create a vehicle using gathering points.

name: Device Weapon Proficiency
description: Reduce the thac0 required to use a device that you have created or intuited by 1.

name: Mechanus Patron
description: Follow the teachings and praise a god of engineering, metalworking, or crafting. A classic example is Vulcan. Sacrifice devices and resources to your patron to gain their favor and blessing.

name: City Planning
description: Become an expert at designing cities, their utilities, and infrastructure.

name: Modron Form
description: Transform yourself into part modron allowing you to add mechanical automated components onto your own body.

name: Modron Familiar
description: Convert an allied modron into a familiar.

name: Programming
description: Allows you to create devices and vehicles with complex instructions. Also allows you to program any programmable device with permissions.

name: Hacking
description: Allows you to hack into programmable devices, giving yourself permissions to program and change settings. Roll contested intelligence against the original programmer to hack the device.
